description: Golden samples for RAG ranking accuracy testing. These queries validate that ranking improves result ordering, domain boosting works correctly, and deduplication removes near-duplicates.

samples.description: Fertilizer application query should find nitrogen guide

samples.description: Rainfall-yield query should find correlation guide
